email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - mv SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this email finds you well. We have the mv SEA HORIZON available for your steel coils shipment from Busan to Los Angeles. The vessel has a DWT of 85000 and an LOA of 250m. The cargo size is 12000MT on CFR terms. The starting freight quote is USD 75 per MT. Laycan is 25-30 October. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - mv SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks for the offer. USD 75 per MT seems a bit high. Can you provide a better rate? Also, what is the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - mv SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I can offer USD 72 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - mv SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 72 per MT is better. Can we push it to USD 70 per MT? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 27 October - 1 November?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - mv SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

USD 70 per MT is possible. Laycan adjusted to 27 October - 1 November. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - mv SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - mv SEA HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: mv SEA HORIZON
- Cargo: 12000MT Steel Coils
- Load Port: Busan
- Discharge Port: Los Angeles
- Laycan: 27 October - 1 November
- Freight: USD 70 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 15,000 per day
- Incoterm: CFR

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
